results.title: [Effect of metformin on the incidence of venous thromboembolism in medical inpatients during hospitalization].
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ were divided into @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ group and control group according to whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ was used or not, and the incidence rates of @DISEASE_Venous_Thrombosis @DISEASE_MESH:D020246 @@@deep vein thrombosis@@@ (@DISEASE_Venous_Thrombosis @DISEASE_MESH:D020246 @@@DVT@@@), @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Embolism @DISEASE_MESH:D011655 @@@pulmonary thromboembolism@@@ (@DISEASE_Pulmonary_Embolism @DISEASE_MESH:D011655 @@@PTE@@@) and @<m>DISEASE_Hemorrhage</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006470 @@@bleeding@@@ events were compared between @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ group and the control group, and multifactorial logistic regression model was used to analyze the association between the use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and risk of @DISEASE_Venous_Thrombosis @DISEASE_MESH:D020246 @@@DVT@@@, @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Embolism @DISEASE_MESH:D011655 @@@PTE@@@, @DISEASE_Gastrointestinal_Hemorrhage @DISEASE_MESH:D006471 @@@gastrointestinal hemorrhage@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Hemorrhage</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006470 @@@bleeding@@@ from other parts of the body.

citations.NLM: Huang WY, Yan XY, Chen YR. [Effect of metformin on the incidence of venous thromboembolism in medical inpatients during hospitalization]. Zhonghua Yi Xue Za Zhi. 2025 Sep 23;105(36):3208-3213. PMID: 41017352

results.title: Effect of metformin on sepsis-associated acute lung injury and gut microbiota in aged rats with sepsis
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ treatment reversed the pathological changes including @DISEASE_Lung_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D055370 @@@lung tissue damage@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Hemorrhage</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006470 @@@hemorrhage@@@, and @DISEASE_Edema @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@edema@@@ in aged @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with CLP-induced @DISEASE_Sepsis @DISEASE_MESH:D018805 @@@sepsis@@@.

results.title: MDSCs participate in the pathogenesis of diffuse pulmonary hemorrhage in murine lupus through mTOR-FoxO1 signaling
results.text_hl: Therefore, to investigate whether the AMPK/@GENE_MTOR @GENE_56717 @@@mTOR@@@ signal is involved in the pathogenesis of @<m>DISEASE_Hemorrhage</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006470 @@@DPH@@@, the @<m>DISEASE_Hemorrhage</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006470 @@@DPH@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ model was treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (the AMPK agonist), or @CHEMICAL_sapanisertib @CHEMICAL_MESH:C572449 @@@INK128@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Sirolimus @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020123 @@@rapamycin@@@ (@GENE_MTOR @GENE_56717 @@@mTOR@@@ inhibitors), respectively.

results.title: Digestive hemorrhage caused by a Meckel's diverticulum in a metformin-treated patient: is there any connection?
results.text_hl: Although no coagulation study was done and the @DISEASE_Meckel_Diverticulum @DISEASE_MESH:D008467 @@@Meckel's diverticulum@@@ is normally associated with @<m>DISEASE_Hemorrhage</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006470 @@@bleeding@@@, the particular intensity of the following @<m>DISEASE_Hemorrhage</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006470 @@@hemorrhage@@@ may have been favored by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Burrull-Madero MA, Del-Villar-Ruiz A, Grau-Cerrato S, Andreu-Garcia M, Goday-Arno A. Digestive hemorrhage caused by a Meckel's diverticulum in a metformin-treated patient: is there any connection? Pharm World Sci. 2001 Jun;23(3):120-1. PMID: 11468878

results.title: Metformin ameliorates gender-and age-dependent hemodynamic instability and myocardial injury in murine hemorrhagic shock.
results.journal: Biochim Biophys Acta Mol Basis Dis
results.text_hl: Thus, our data suggest that targeting metabolic recovery with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may be a potential treatment approach in severe @<m>DISEASE_Hemorrhage</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006470 @@@hemorrhage@@@ in adult population.
